verses.text: God \w be|strong="H7892"\w* merciful unto us, and bless us, \add And\add* cause his face \w to|strong="H5329"\w* shine \w upon|strong="H5329"\w* us; \qs Selah\qs*

\w That|strong="H1288"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* known \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w Thy|strong="H6440"\w* salvation among \w all|strong="H1288"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w*.
Let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples praise \w thee|strong="H1870"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; Let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples praise \w thee|strong="H1870"\w*.

Oh let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* glad \w and|strong="H5971"\w* sing \w for|strong="H3605"\w* joy; \w For|strong="H3605"\w* thou wilt judge \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* equity, \w And|strong="H5971"\w* govern \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w upon|strong="H5971"\w* earth. \qs Selah\qs*

\w Let|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w thee|strong="H5148"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; \w Let|strong="H8055"\w* all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w thee|strong="H5148"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w hath|strong="H5971"\w* yielded \w its|strong="H3605"\w* increase: God, even \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* God, \w will|strong="H5971"\w* bless \w us|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*; \w And|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* earth shall fear \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.
